entry.title: Yifan Li
entry.content:
Yifan Li

Email: yifan at ibs dot re dot kr

Current Position

Postdoctoral research fellow in Center for Geometry and Physics, Institute for Basic Science (IBS)

Education

  • 2010-2014 Bachelor of Science in Department of Mathematical Science, Tsinghua University
  • 2014 Exchange study in Departement de Mathematiques et Applications, lâ€™Ecole normale superieure
  • 2014-2019 Doctor of Philosophy under the supervise of Prof. Li Si, in Yau Mathematical Sciences Center, Tsinghua University

Research Interest

Geometry and topology, mathematical physics. Specifically, non-commutative geometry and mirror symmetry, including Koszul duality theory, Landau-Ginzburg models, Frobenius manifolds, variation of semi-infinite Hodge structures, deformation quantization and cohomological field theory.

Publication and Preprints

  • with S. Li & W. He, G-twisted braces and orbifold Landau-Ginzburg Models, Communications in Mathematical Physics 373.1 (2020): 175-217.
  • with S. Li & W. He, Unfolding of Orbifold LG B-Models: A Case Study, Pure and Applied Mathematics Quarterly 14.3 (2018): 443-465.

Invited Talks

  • 09/11/2017 Hochschild cohomology of curved algebras and orbifold Landau-Ginzburg models, Symplectic Geometry and Mathematical Physics Seminar, Peking University
  • 28/11/2017 Orbifold Landau-Ginzburg models via algebraic methods, Mathematical Physics Seminar, Sichuan University
  • 15/01/2018 Orbifold Landau-Ginzburg models, East Asian Core Doctoral Forum on Mathematics 2018, Beijing, China
  • 20/07/2018 Mathematical aspects of Landau-Ginzburg models, Poster Session, String-Math 2018, Tohoku University
  • 13/11/2018 Hochschild cohomology of curved algebras and orbifold Landau-Ginzburg models, Colloquium & Seminars, ShanghaiTech University
  • 24/11/2018 Hochschild Cohomology of Curved Algebras and Orbifold Landau-Ginzburg B-models, Program for the Mini-Workshop on Hochschild Cohomology and Related Topics III, East China Normal University
  • 13/06/2019 Algebraic Approaches to Orbifold Landau-Ginzburg B-models, ICCM2019, Beijing, China
  • 11/07/2019 Algebraic Approaches to Orbifold LG B-models, Seminars, Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
  • 10/09/2019 Moduli Space of Quiver Representations, Seminars, Zhejiang University.
  • 11/25/2019 A Survey for LG/LG Mirror Symmetry, Seminars, IBS-CGP.

Teaching Experiences

  • 2017-2018 Teaching assistant and grader, Calculus given by Prof. Li Tiecheng, Tsinghua University
  • Fall 2016 Teaching assistant and grader, Topology given by Prof. Li Si, Tsinghua University
  • Spring 2017 Teaching assistant and grader, Algebraic Topology given by Prof. Li Si, Tsinghua University
  • Spring 2016 Teaching assistant and grader, Classical Mechanics by Prof. Lu Wenxuan, Tsinghua Univesity
  • Fall 2015 Teaching assistant and grader, Linear Algebra given by Prof. Li Si, Tsinghua University
  • 2014-2015 Teaching assistant and grader, Calculus given by Prof. Zhang Jiming, Tsinghua University
  • Summer 2014 Teaching Assistant, Linear Algebra given by Prof. Bong Lian, Tsinghua Summer Mathcamp for High School Students
entry.summary:
Yifan Li

Email: yifan at ibs dot re dot kr

Current Position

Postdoctoral
